speaker: Smol Natsuki
text: Wait, you guys are all on an adventure without me!?

speaker: Smol Natsuki
text: I could've helped you, you know!

speaker: Smol Sayori
text: We didn't realize you wanted to join us...

speaker: Smol Monika
text: If it'd make you feel better, we could all fight you so you can show off your power.

speaker: Smol Natsuki
text: But don't blame me when I wipe the floor with you guys!
